definition: to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

sentences.english: First it is a reaction to behaviorism.
sentences.chinese: 首先是对行为主义的异议。

sentences.english: What is the influence of behaviourism over american structuralism?
sentences.chinese: 行为主义对美国结构主义的影响？

sentences.english: Behaviourism leaves out of account consciousness and introspection.
sentences.chinese: 行为主义不把意识和内省考虑在内。

sentences.english: Because the first force was behaviorism.
sentences.chinese: 因为第一势力是行为主义。

sentences.english: New institutionalism develops on the basis of reaction against behaviorism.
sentences.chinese: 新制度主义是在批判行为主义基础上发展起来的。

sentences.english: The behaviorists never succeeded in making clear the difference between physiology and behaviorism.
sentences.chinese: 行为主义者从来都没分清楚生理学和行为主义的区别。

sentences.english: It seems neither mentalists nor behaviorists are able to give us a satisfactory answer.
sentences.chinese: 心智主义与行为主义论并未能给予满意的解释。
有什么关于行为主义的问题吗？

sentences.english: What are your questions about behaviorism?
sentences.chinese: 你们关于行为主义的问题是什么？

sentences.english: So, here are the three general positions of behaviorism.
sentences.chinese: 这是行为主义的三个基本观点。

definition: Floyd (name)/Freud (name)/Dr Sigmund Freud (1856-1939), the founder of psychoanalysis
Floyd (name)/Freud (name)/Dr Sigmund Freud (1856-1939), the founder of psychoanalysis

pinyin: Fa3 lan2 ke4 fu2 Xue2 pai4

definition: epistemology (in philosophy, the theory of how we know things)
